title: Champion hobbies
body:
I feel like most of the champions in League of Legends have got hobbies and... these are my ideas about them

{{champion:163}}: Surfing - _ We all know it_
{{champion:223}}: Cooking - _Obviously_
{{champion:134}}: Dodgeball - _Because... balls_
{{champion:254}}: Boxing -  _ Another obvious thing_
{{champion:143}}: Gardening - _ PLANTIES_
{{champion:114}}: Fencing - _Come on, she is always fencing_
{{champion:74}}: Robotics - _Those turrets will put Torbjorn to shame_
{{champion:202}}: Art - _He even quotes it_
{{champion:37}}: Music - _Even when fighting, she is using the power of music_
{{champion:107}}: Hunting - _Well, duh_
{{champion:31}}: Eating - _Maybe Tahm Kench's food_
{{champion:420}}: Worshipping - _All her lines, including ''Nagakabouros'' prove my theory_
{{champion:4}}: Playing cards - _There's nothing else to say_
{{champion:432}}: Doing spiritual thingies - _He is a spiritual creature himself_
{{champion:53}}: Doing favors - _''Fired up and ready to serve'' he said_
{{champion:203}}: Ending lifes - _That is their purpose actually_
{{champion:268}}: Playing in the sand - _He is always doing it_
{{champion:136}}: Creating stars - _Just lore things_
{{champion:245}}: Time travelling - _ More like 80% of everything he does_

replies.body:
I believe you missed one:

{{champion:41}} : Scrimshaw (as seen in [Burning Tides, Act 1, Part 4](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/#story-1 ))

Omfg a rioter noticed me YAAAAY 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
And doing it terrifyingly at that.

{{champion:133}}: Drawing
{{champion:7}}: Magic show performances
{{champion:40}}: Storm chasing
{{champion:111}}: Scuba diving
Lol I think Janna's main job is storm chasing. Her hobby could have something to do with 2.95 per minute
I feel like fiora would like drawing for a second hobby too since in her taunt i think she draws teemo

{{champion:35}} - Cosplaying as the Joker
{{champion:27}} - Getting high on experimental drugs
{{champion:161}} - Secretly spying on math classes
{{champion:32}} - Composing lyrics for his emocore band
{{champion:115}} - Gives motivational speeches for terrorists

{{champion:420}} "Many gods ask for worship. They are weak gods."

I think she would knock your teeth in for suggesting such a thing...

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Ballad,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TJBwOvNh,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-07-27T03:50:58.979+0000)
>
> {{champion:420}} "Many gods ask for worship. They are weak gods."
> 
> I think she would knock your teeth in for suggesting such a thing...

She might, she seems pretty violent, but since worship can mean devotion granted to a deity, and that's all she seems to do, yeah, her hobby would be worshiping.
But her God actually doesn't ask for worship so... Rekt Get
She "worships" by knocking other people's teeth in(with giant glowing tentacles), so...
OK, OK, I will expand this and do a Number. 2 with more ones for you, idea-givers.
